title: PROJECT: Lucian skin
body: Well i thought to myself why not get this skin it loos fucking amazing but then i buy it and get into game and it looks like a load of shit wtf, to misleading !! so angery {{champion:236}}

replies.body:
Im sorry that you didn't get what you thought :(

A bit of research never goes amiss though 
Try using this channel when buying skins in the future:
https://www.youtube.com/user/SkinSpotlights

Its very very useful!

Personally though I think Project Lucian isn't bad. 
I hope you come to like it.
